game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost artifact
game.description: Deep in the Foreboding Forest lies an ancient artifact of unimaginable value. But beware, for the forest is fraught with dangers unseen and creatures unknown. Will you dare to retrieve the lost artifact?

tasks.objective: Reach the entrance of the Foreboding Forest
tasks.description: Navigate your way through the treacherous paths and reach the entrance of the Foreboding Forest

tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian of the forest
tasks.description: Defeat the fearsome guardian who roams the entrance of the forest to clear your way in
Find the hidden cave which is believed to house the lost artifact
tasks.location: Deep within the Forest of Shadows

tasks.description: Overcome the final hurdle and retrieve the artifact
